mapper.insert: insert into zb_recommend (id, requirement_id, order_num, add_time, update_time, user_id, status, recommend_length) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{requirementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recommendLength,jdbcType=INTEGER})
